Articles.Content:
The new SAS system is garnering a lot of mixed reviews, and there are a few simple things that can be done to help acclimate players to the change. The first big one is to add a new optional indicator in the VAB/SPH: center of torque. It's not really clear to a lot of players about how reaction wheels function, so being able to check where the center of torque is for their craft will help a lot.

The other suggestion I have is to re-implement the old SAS system as a sub-system of the current one, and make it so the player can toggle between the old (HOLD) and new (SAS) modes.

Center of torque has no effect, the torque is automatically distributed through the craft. It's clear now that some people have bugs in their SAS, so I wouldn't call for the old one too. I believe once this is fixed and it works for everyone, I don't believe anyone will want the old one back.
